org.easyrules.core

Class DefaultJmxRulesEngine

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.easyrules.core.DefaultJmxRulesEngine
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JmxRulesEngine, RulesEngine

    public class DefaultJmxRulesEngine
extends java.lang.Object
implements JmxRulesEngine
    Default JmxRulesEngine implementation.

    This implementation handles a set of JMX rules with unique names.

    Author:
    Drem Darios (drem.darios@gmail.com)

    • Method Detail

      • registerJmxRule

        public void registerJmxRule(java.lang.Object rule)
        Description copied from interface: JmxRulesEngine
        Register a rule in the rules engine registry. This method also registers the rule as a JMX bean. The rule object must be JMX compliant.
        Specified by:
        registerJmxRule in interface JmxRulesEngine
        Parameters:
        rule - the rule to register

      • unregisterJmxRule

        public void unregisterJmxRule(java.lang.Object rule)
        Description copied from interface: JmxRulesEngine
        Unegister a rule from the rules engine registry. This method also unregisters the rule from MBean server.
        Specified by:
        unregisterJmxRule in interface JmxRulesEngine
        Parameters:
        rule - the rule to register
